sentences.sContent: ...a programme to inoculate every child in the country.
sentences.sCn: ...一个给全国每个孩子接种疫苗的计划。

remMethod.val: in(进入) + ocul(萌芽) + ate → 在萌芽时进入 → 注射预防针

words.tran: [机] 变质剂；接种体，接种菌

trans.tranOther: to protect someone against a disease by putting a weak form of the disease into their body using a needle
